about_the_game:
Description:
Play as a failed experiment of a tyrant necromancer. Step into a world shrouded in darkness, where the power of necromancy reigns supreme. In Necromon, you play as a budding necromancer seeking to overthrow the tyrannical rule of four powerful necromancer bosses who have plunged the world into chaos. As you delve deeper into their domains, you'll harness the dark arts to raise fallen minions, turning them into loyal servants to aid you in your quest for dominance.

Unleash Your Undead Squad:
In this rogue-lite adventure, every defeated minion becomes a potential ally. With each enemy vanquished, you'll unlock their dark essence and gain the ability to summon them back from the grave. From lowly skeletons to fearsome revenants, assemble your undead army and customize their abilities to suit your playstyle.

Master the Art of Necromancy:
Experiment with different combinations of minions to create powerful synergies on the battlefield. Mix and match their unique skills and traits to form the ultimate undead squad.

Confront the Tyrant Necromancers:
Venture forth into the treacherous domains ruled by the tyrant necromancers, each wielding their own dark powers and commanding legions of undead minions. From the decrepit crypts to the cursed forests, prepare to face relentless challenges as you strive to topple their oppressive reign.

Forge Your Path to Power:
As you progress through the game, discover hidden secrets and unlock new necromantic abilities to strengthen your hold over the undead. Enhance your minions with powerful relics, master ancient rituals to augment your necromantic prowess, and uncover the truth behind the tyrant necromancers' dark origins.

Will you succumb to the temptation of ultimate power, or will you use your necromantic abilities to bring balance to the world once more? The fate of the Dominion lies in your hands.

content_descriptors.notes: There are zombies and some pixelated blood.
